short_summary: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) with a LiDAR sensor and accessories to build in-house capacity to assess stream fish habitat, riparian cover, and restoration effectiveness through remote sensing.
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires a Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) with a LiDAR sensor and accessories to build in-house capacity to assess stream fish habitat, riparian cover, and restoration effectiveness through remote sensing.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: LiDAR Drone Services**
=====================================================

**Tender Details**
---------------

* ** Tender Reference Number**: WS4159053161
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4159053161
* **Publication Date**: October 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 30, 2023 02:00 PM EST
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

**Summary**
----------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to provide Remotely Piloted Aircraft System (RPAS) with a Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) sensor and accessories to support the assessment of stream fish habitat, riparian cover, and restoration effectiveness through remote sensing.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* The RPAS system must be equipped with a LiDAR sensor and accessories to meet the requirements of the project.
* The system must be capable of remote sensing and data collection.
* The provider must demonstrate expertise in LiDAR technology and RPAS operations.

**Business Requirements**
----------------------

* The successful vendor will be required to provide a comprehensive proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and technical capabilities.
* The proposal must include a detailed cost breakdown and a minimum one-year warranty on the RPAS system.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------

* Technical proposal: 40%
* Cost proposal: 30%
* Past experience and references: 30%

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

* Proposals must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery website.
* The proposal must include all required documentation and supporting materials.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Contact: Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (please note that the phone number is not provided)

This is a request for proposal, and the proposal evaluation will be based on the criteria outlined above. All proposals must be submitted in accordance with the requirements set out in this tender notice. The deadline for submission is October 30, 2023, at 02:00 PM EST. ENDS.
